text: Air pirate (also known as sky pirate) is a stock character from science fiction and fantasy. Air pirate may also refer to: *A person who commits air piracy, the unlawful seizure of an aircraft by an individual or a group *Air Pirates, a former group of cartoonists *The Air Pirates (film), 1920 German film *The Air Pirates, a nickname for the 1st Attack-Reconnaissance Battalion (AH-64) of the 211th Aviation Regiment (United States) ==See also== * *Sky pirate (disambiguation) * Pirate (disambiguation) *Skyjacker (disambiguation)
title: Air pirate (disambiguation)
